issue.title: [Gandiva] fail CI if ctest doesn't run any tests
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4077](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4077). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This has happened a couple of times already due to changes in build/flags/labels and it's hard to figure out unless we look into the travis output carefully.

Instead, travis_script_gandiva_cpp.sh should terminate with a non-zero error if no tests are run.
